original_text: You must send this command to everyone in your great kingdom. When people know about this law, all the women will respect their husbands. They will obey them, whether they are important people or ordinary people.’
korean_text: 왕의 조서가 이 광대한 전국에 반포되면 귀천을 막론하고 모든 여인들이 그들의 남편을 존경하리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: to everyone in your great kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 위대한 왕국 안의 모든 사람에게

sentences.original_text: When people know about this law
all the women will respect their husbands
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 여성들은 자신의 남편들을 존경할 것입니다
